data.text: Yahweh gave to the prophet Jeremiah a message about the people of Philistia. The message was given to me before Gaza city in Philistia was captured by the army of Egypt.
They will hear the sound of the hooves of the enemy horses,
It will be the time for all the people of Philistia to be destroyed,
The people of Gaza will be humiliated;
The people of Philistia say, â€œYahweh, when [RHQ] will you tell our enemies to stop killing us with [PRS] their swords?
But it would not be right [RHQ] for their swords to stay there,
